items.title: Model-based System and Architecture Engineering with the Arcadia Method
items.descr: This book describes the fundamentals of the method and its contribution to engineering issues such as requirements management, product line, system supervision, and integration, verification and validation (IVV).

items.title: IEEE Syscon - Not (strictly) relying on SysML for MBSE: language, tooling and development perspectives

items.title: Tutorial - Toy Catapult Project
